subject: Entrepreneurship
title: Work Integration Social Enterprises
description: A short lesson to help you apply Work Integration Social Enterprises.

hook.text: When nobody will hire youâ€”no experience, a criminal record, or a disabilityâ€”WISEs open the door.

buildup.text: Work Integration Social Enterprises create real businesses specifically to employ excluded people.

discovery.text: Greyston Bakery in New York hires anyone who walks in. No background check. No interview. No questions.

twist.text: Their brownies are so good that Ben & Jerry's buys millions of dollars' worth for their ice cream.

climax.text: Greyston proved open hiring works. Turnover dropped and productivity rose once they stopped screening.

punchline.text: Sometimes the best hiring policy is no policy at all.

quiz.question: What is unique about Greyston Bakery's hiring practice?
options: They only hire graduates from top culinary schools
They hire anyone who walks in with no interview or background check
They use AI algorithms to select the most qualified bakers
